ARABIC: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّىَ بَنَانَهُۥ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the contrary! We are well able to reshape his fingers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely We are able to reform even his finger-tips.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Yes indeed; We have the power to remould even his finger-tips.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We certainly have the power to restore them even the very tips of their finger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Surely yes, why not? We can properly make all his phalanxes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Yes, We are able to put together in perfect order the tips of his fingers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Yea! We are able to make complete his very fingertips
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Yes indeed; We are able to shape again his fingers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Yea, verily. We are Able to restore his very fingers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Indeed, We have the power to restore his very finger tips!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Yea! WE are Able to put together evenly his finger-tips.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Yes indeed, We are able to [re]shape [even] his fingertips!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, We are able to put together in perfect order the very tips of his fingers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Yes, We are Able to put together in perfect order the tips of his fingers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed yes, We are able to shape his fingerstips yet again!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Yes indeed; We are Able to reconstruct his fingertips.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:4] Yes, indeed!, We shall assemble them. We are able, in addition to assembling them, to reshape [even] his fingers, that is to say, to restore their bones just as they had been, despite their smallness: so how much more so [are We able to restore] the larger ones!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Yea, verily) I am capable of doing so. (Yea, We are able to restore his very fingers!) We are able to gather his fingers, such that his palm becomes like the hoof of a camel or beasts. He says: We are able to make his hand look like the hoof of a camel, so how is it that We cannot restore his bones?
